body: "The by-election in the parish of St. John is in full swing, with the usual bickering and personal attacks that have come to personify Bajan election campaigns": Cheese-on-bread! can't wait for the whole thing to be over and done with.
original_body: "The by-election in the parish of St. John is in full swing, with the usual bickering and personal attacks that have come to personify Bajan election campaigns": Cheese-on-bread! can't wait for the whole thing to be over and done with.
title: Barbados: By-Election for Late PM's Seat
